Paragraph.Text: Molybdenum Ore is found below the Toxic Caverns. As you go deeper the richness of the veins will increase. It can be mined with a Build Gun MK3, the Hard Rock Grinder and Trencher Extractors.

The first stages of ore smelting can be done with standard Ore Smelters. Molybdenum Ore requires the "Arc Smelter" upgrade to be processed by Ore Smelters as it requires higher melting temperatures than normal. Later, when throughput is valued over efficiency, a Blast Furnace setup is strongly recommended

TwoColumnParagraph.Left:
Occurrence: Couleur Ping: 1ère Etape de l'Extraction: 2ème Etape de l'Extraction: 3ème Etape de l'Extraction: 1ère Etape de Fonte:
2ème Etape de Fonte:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right:
-750 to -1900m Bright Yellow Build Gun MK3 Hard rock grinder Trencher Extractor MK1-MK3
Ore Smelter with "Arc Smelter" upgrade Blast Furnace setup
